tool_description: A list of recipes with a wide variety of categories with instructions and ingredients and predicted calories.
name: Recipes API
title: Recipes API

api_list.name: Get Recipe by ID
api_list.description: If you know the recipe ID you can call it by ID

api_list.name: Random Recipe
api_list.description: You can randomly call a recipe. Ability to filter by category and limit the amount of results

api_list.name: Recipe Categories
api_list.description: A list of the categories available for recipes. These categories can be used to filter.
